class.name: PopupMenuEvent
class.javadoc:
PopupMenuEvent only contains the source of the event which is the JPoupMenu sending the event

Warning: Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with future Swing releases. The current serialization support is appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage of all JavaBeansTM has been added to the java.beans package. Please see {@link java.beans.XMLEncoder}. Arnaud Weber

Constructs a PopupMenuEvent object.
source the Object that originated the event (typically this)
